nodes.text: Subnode was a term used to describe a living thing created in the image of its creator. Kud'ar Mub'at, member of the arachnoid species known as the Assemblers, had many small subnodes who served him in particular fields. Such subnodes held eponymous names, such as Signaler, who notified Mub'at of arrivals to the arachnoid's web.
